nodes.text: Gandolo IV was a location where, by 3 ABY, the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca had attempted to build a secret Wookiee colony. Their efforts were thwarted by the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk, who almost succeeded in capturing the pair to claim the bounty on their heads.

Gandolo IV was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in "Tooth and Claw", a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020. It originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned as a planet in Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back, a 1989 supplement written by Michael Stern for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It then appeared for the first time in the 1998 Legends video game Star Wars: Rebellion.
